Assessment_Factor: Actual effectiveness of state protection, not just efforts made by the state

Evidence_Used: Applicant's testimony, reports of threats, attempts to seek protection in Mexico

Evidence_Assessed: Threats received post-reporting, relocation attempts, engagement with Mexican authorities
Relief_Sought: Allowance of refugee claim or remittal for re-determination
Governing_Rule: The standard of proof is the balance of probabilities; focus on actual effectiveness of protection
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Board incorrectly assessed sufficiency of evidence by confusing it with standard of proof
Outcome: Decision set aside, case remitted to a different Board Member for re-determination
